name: MLMediaLibrary
desc: The MLMediaLibrary class provides an interface for accessing a collection of media objects from various sources. It serves as the initial access point of the Media Library framework.

items.name: init(options: [String : Any])
items.desc: Initializes the media library based on the specified load options.

items.name: var mediaSources: [String : MLMediaSource]?
items.desc: Returns a dictionary of media sources by identifier.
